svg.title: Smart Pole IoT Data Flow Architecture

g.text: Smart Pole IoT Data Flow Architecture

path.id: Lighting Logic\n(PIR + Sound + LDR)-to-UART → XBee TX
Security Logic\n(Flame + Gas + Sound)-to-UART → XBee TX
Environmental Logic\n(PM + Temp + Humidity)-to-UART → XBee TX
Data Filtering\n& Threshold Evaluation-to-MQTT Client\n(Data Uplink)
